name: High Flyer (Commodore Business Machines)
overview: Big Business your forte? This is an opportunity to manage your own air-company. Like all the best pioneers in big business you start at the bottom with a small going concertn and by astuteness and business acurmen develop your company into a multi-million enterprise. The decisions are all yours: plane schedules and routings; what type of aircraft will make the best profits; when it is the best time to either extend your fleet of aircrat or make improvements to existing stock; whether or not you need to borrow money from the blank and which banks will give you the best rates of exchange. Furthermore, having made enough split decisions in one day, you can save the position you have reached until the next time you wish to join the high-flyers.
